name: CORE (Alex T. Colombini)
description:
Confront the old core and take its place.

Use your shield to protect yourself and also to move around the core room.

Controls:
Space to activate the shield.
Left/Right arrows to rotate.

This game is my submission to the Ludum Dare 37. Check the submission for feedback:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=88290
